en.title: FusonExcel Moving in Canada!
en.content:
REPORT BY FE EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR PATRICK KUA, MISSISSAUGA CANADA STOCKIST.

Canadian FusionExcel distributor Ms. Lauri Taylor of Richmond Hill, Ontario celebrated the official Grand Opening of her Living Free Wellness Centre on 20th June 2009. Living Free Wellness is a total health and wellness centre offering innovative strategies and technologies that empower optimal health.

Present to do the Ribbon Cutting was the Mayor of the Town of Richmond Hill, Mr. Dave Barrow. We had another distinguished guest The Honourable MP of Richmond Hill, Mr. Bryon Wilfert attending as well.

Patrick performed two different tests on each of the distinguished guests. Mr. Wilfert did the Flexibility and Cell Phone Tests, followed by Mr. Barrow doing the Balance and Strength Tests. They were both thrilled and amazed to feel the difference when the Quantum Pendant was placed in their pockets and retested. Mayor Barrow even joked about how the Quantum Pendant is going to help him with his golf tournament on Monday!

On behalf of FusionExcel Canada HQ, Patrick and Lauri presented a Quantum Pendant each to Mr. Wilfert and Mr. Barrow. 



MP Bryon Wilfert.
Mayor Dave Barrow. Mayor Dave Barrow.
Mayor Dave Barrow. Ribbon Cutting.
